explains: adj. 不可思议的；难以想像的

sentences.en: The scale of the fighting is almost unimaginable.
sentences.cn: 战斗的规模几乎难以想像。

sentences.en: This level of success would have been unimaginable just last year.
sentences.cn: 取得这样的成就，这在仅仅一年前都是不敢想象的。

sentences.en: Now his future lay plain before him, and glowing with unimaginable splendor.
sentences.cn: 现在，他的未来展现在他面前，闪耀着难以想象的光辉。
